markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Breathtaking Vapor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1993)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Inhaled" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=96" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 67 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This colorless mist has a mild, waxy scent that precedes acute shortness of breath. Creatures that don't need to breathe can still take the poison's damage but are immune to its other effects.

 **Saving Throw** DC 38 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 round; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 6d6 poison damage, [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), and [can't breathe](/Rules.aspx?ID=468); **Stage 2** 8d6 poison damage, drained 2, and reduce remaining air by 1 additional round; **Stage 3** 10d6 poison damage, drained 3, and reduce remaining air by 2 additional rounds

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Breathtaking Vapor
